CustomField.formula: IF( Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Cash_Account_RT', Account__r.BillingStreet + " "+ Account__r.BillingCity + " " + Account__r.BillingPostalCode + " " + Account__r.BillingState, Service_Contract__r.ShippingStreet + " "+ Service_Contract__r.ShippingCity + " " + Service_Contract__r.ShippingPostalCode + " " + Service_Contract__r.ShippingState )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows service contract's address information
CustomField.label: Site
